description.value: Sivv engineers inspired by a species enslaved by the sivv designed this augmentation, which consists of enchanted brass wings integrated into the subject’s spine. While the wings have an impressive wingspan when in use, they fold up neatly and can be hidden under loose clothing. When in use, wing extensions grant you a fly speed of 60 feet with average maneuverability. They do not function in a thin atmosphere or vacuum, and can be used for up to 1 hour per day, in 10-minute increments. Mk 2 wing extensions function in thin atmospheres and vacuum, and include enchantments that allow you to ignore the hazardous environmental effects of outer space and vacuum.
